attributes.additional_details:
It present E-Petitions are not mandatory and after reaching 100,000 votes the government and parliament can ignore them. As has happened to 2 votes so far.

I propose that the 100,000 vote become mandatory for parliament to debate and vote on it within the next session of parliament.

Also that after 250,000 votes it becomes mandatory for parliament to debate it within 4 weeks.

Also that after 1,000,000 votes it becomes mandatory to hold a referendum vote at the next national election, be that local government, national or Euro election.
